FuncDef: This command is used to specify route policies that control the handling of inbound routes received from certain peers. Route policies are configured in theconfig>router>policy-optionscontext.

ParaDef.Info: The route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long).
The route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long).
